data.event: Originally called "The Basin" after the circular valley the city is located in, it is unclear as to whether Madras was named in 1903 for the cotton fabric called "Madras" that originated in the city of Madras (now Chennai) in Tamil Nadu, India, or from the name of the city itself.

event.title: originated in the city of Madras (now

data.event: Originally called "The Basin" after the circular valley the city is located in, it is unclear as to whether Madras was named in 1903 for the cotton fabric called "Madras" that originated in the city of Madras (now Chennai) in Tamil Nadu, India, or from the name of the city itself.

event.title: was incorporated as a city in 1911

data.event: Madras was incorporated as a city in 1911.
This airfield now serves as City-County Airport.
